heading: HR01377
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO INQUIRE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, AS TO THE ALLEGATION OF CORRUPTION IN THE DEPARTMENT OF INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATIONS TECHNOLOGY (DICT) THAT LED TO THE RESIGNATION OF THEN DICT SECRETARY RODOLFO SALALIMA WITH THE END IN VIEW OF STRENGTHENING OUR ANTI-CORRUPTION POLICIES
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2017-10-09
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01377
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO INQUIRE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, AS TO THE ALLEGATION OF CORRUPTION IN THE DEPARTMENT OF INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATIONS TECHNOLOGY (DICT) THAT LED TO THE RESIGNATION OF THEN DICT SECRETARY RODOLFO SALALIMA WITH THE END IN VIEW OF STRENGTHENING OUR ANTI-CORRUPTION POLICIES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2017-10-03
